text: Alkalibacillus almallahensis is a Gram-positive, halophilic, endospore- forming, rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium from the genus of Alkalibacillus which has been isolated from sediments from a saltern from La Malahá in Spain. ==References== Category:Bacillaceae Category:Bacteria described in 2014
title: Alkalibacillus almallahensis
